title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-751)
description: On November 12, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)  versions prior to 18.5.2, 18.4.4 and 18.3.6
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)   versions prior to 18.5.2, 18.4.4 and 18.3.6
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
